title: Performance Analysis Prompt
description: A analytical prompt for evaluating system or process
template:
Conduct a thorough performance analysis of {system_or_process}. Your analysis should:

1. Identify performance bottlenecks
2. Measure key performance indicators
3. Compare against industry benchmarks
4. Recommend optimization strategies
5. Prioritize improvements by impact and effort

Provide quantitative data where possible and justify your recommendations.
